description:
Provides a resource to create a VPC NAT Gateway.


-> **NOTE:** Resource bandwidth packages will not be supported since 00:00 on November 4, 2017, and public IP can be replaced be elastic IPs.
If a Nat Gateway has already bought some bandwidth packages, it can not bind elastic IP and you have to submit the [work order](https://selfservice.console.aliyun.com/ticket/createIndex) to solve.
If you want to add public IP, you can use resource 'alicloud_eip_association' to bind several elastic IPs for one Nat Gateway.

-> **NOTE:** From version 1.7.1, this resource has deprecated bandwidth packages.
But, in order to manage stock bandwidth packages, version 1.13.0 re-support configuring 'bandwidth_packages'.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Description.description: Description of the nat gateway, This description can have a string of 2 to 256 characters, It cannot begin with http:// or https://. Defaults to null.

InstanceChargeType.description: The billing method of the nat gateway. Valid values are "PrePaid" and "PostPaid". Default to "PostPaid".

Name.description: Name of the nat gateway. The value can have a string of 2 to 128 characters, must contain only alphanumeric characters or hyphens, such as "-",".","_", and must not begin or end with a hyphen, and must not begin with http:// or https://. Defaults to null.

Period.description: The duration that you will buy the resource, in month. It is valid when `instance_charge_type` is `PrePaid`. Default to 1. Valid values: [1-9, 12, 24, 36]. At present, the provider does not support modify "period" and you can do that via web console.

Spec.description: It has been deprecated from provider version 1.7.1, and new field 'specification' can replace it.

Specification.description: The specification of the nat gateway. Valid values are `Small`, `Middle` and `Large`. Default to `Small`. Details refer to [Nat Gateway Specification](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/doc-detail/42757.htm).
